data.name: Monos: The Endless Tower
data.detailed_description:
A unique tower defense that revolves around one tower!

You have to protect the crystal situated on top from the hordes of monsters coming from down below.





Once in a while, you are given the opportunity to expand the tower in order to get further away from the hordes. The more you expand it the harder the game will get and you’ll encounter new types of enemies.

Features


  • The tower is randomly generated so no game run will be the same.
  • Multiple enemy types that will climb to the top of the tower
  • Different powers that can be used to destroy the monsters.
  • Weapons that must be used to stop the invasion of the enemies
  • Endless possibilities to play in your own way

Will you defend the tower?

data.short_description: Guard the last remaining tower with an array of weapons and magical powers! The horde of monsters coming from down below is relentless and it is your duty to dispatch them in this unique tower defense game!
